# Class KnowledgeRetrieverFactory

Factory class for creating KnowledgeRetriever instances. Provides methods to create knowledge retrievers with embedding capabilities.

##### Index

### Methods

create

## Methods

### `Static`create

  * create(embedder: [TextEmbedder](./primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder)): Promise<[KnowledgeRetriever](./primitives_knowledge_knowledge_retriever.KnowledgeRetriever)>

Creates a new KnowledgeRetriever instance.

#### Parameters

    * embedder: [TextEmbedder](./primitives_embedder_embedder.TextEmbedder)

Text embedder to use for embedding-based retrieval

#### Returns Promise<[KnowledgeRetriever](./primitives_knowledge_knowledge_retriever.KnowledgeRetriever)>

Promise resolving to a new KnowledgeRetriever instance

#### Throws

InworldError if creation fails

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
